name: Match Master!
description:
Do you have what it takes to become a Match Master?

In this relaxing puzzle game, you have one simple task: clear the tiles off the screen! Sounds easy, right? But as the levels progress, your screen fills up with more colorful tiles, matching tiles become harder to find, and new challenges appear!

This satisfying take on mahjong puzzles will sharpen your mind and give your brain a workout!

→ Goal: Match the tiles to clear the screen.
→ Strategy: Go for the easy matches first and save the harder-to-reach tiles for later.
→ Top tip: Make sure you keep some space free in the area below - if it fills up and you haven’t found a match, you’ll have to start over!

Once you’ve finished a level, celebrate with a satisfying burst of confetti! And then play the next level… and the next… and the next… to become a Match Master!

• Earn rewards as you play

As you complete more levels, things can get a bit challenging! But don’t worry, you can collect rewards that let you go back a step, get a hint, or shuffle all the tiles - phew!

• Get that mahjong vibe all day long

With a huge number of levels, you can jump in and out of sessions whenever you want!

• Extra content

We love adding new fun features to our puzzle games, so keep an eye out for extra content soon!
